Our social and economic environment

  1. population growth and ageing
    questions: how we affort those who retire in the age of 65, and then lives over 30 years longer? do we have work when the generation of 1940-1950 goes away?
  2. rapid global economic changes
  3. unemployment
  4. urbanization
    questions: is population growth causing a problem to cities? is urbanization a problem or an opportunity to cities?
